title: The ultimate spaghetti Bolognese
ingredients: ['400g premium beef mince', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes with basil', '290g tomato puree', '125ml water', '2 cloves garlic', '400g dried spaghetti pasta', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon ground pepper', '4 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', 'grated Parmesan cheese to taste']
